snippet: Militants again blew up a Sinai Peninsula gas pipeline that carries fuel to neighboring Israel and Jordan, Egyptian security officials said Monday.
abstract: Egyptian military officials say that militants have again blown up a Sinai Peninsula gas pipeline that carries fuel to neighboring Israel and Jordan.
lead_paragraph: Militants again blew up a Sinai Peninsula gas pipeline that carries fuel to neighboring Israel and Jordan, Egyptian security officials said Monday.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
